plot outline: Manoj's younger brother Shankar is in love with Rathi, but he is too timid to reveal his feelings to her. Unknown to him, Rathi loves him too but is waiting for him to make the first move. Meanwhile, Manoj too falls in love with Rathi at first sight. When Shankar finally realises the truth, he becomes ready to sacrifice his love for his brother.
